00070 //$_GET['cmd']='SU,36476,g.#,_###,homolka@rk3002.com,,Günt#:_###:he:r,Homolka,g.homolka@belisk.com,,,,,3002,Purkersdorf';

00072 $_GET['cmd']='SHELL,zmprov gaa';

00076           zlog::log(zerror::err('no command diven',null,zerror::critical));

00085 $included=array();

00087 
00088 
00089 $cmdcoder=new CMDParser();

00091 foreach($_GET['cmd'] as $command){
00092           list($err,$cmd)=$cmdcoder->decode($command);
00093           print_r($cmd);
00094           if($err){
00095                     echo $err;
00096           }else{
00097                     if(!isset($included[$cmd['class']])){
00098                               require_once 'classes/'.$cmd['class'].'.php';
00099                               $included[$cmd['class']]=new $cmd['class']();
00100                     }
00101                     list($ret,$return)=call_user_func_array(array($included[$cmd['class']], $cmd['action']), $cmd['params']);
00102           }
00103 }

00105 
00106 exit;
